Package tools.gui.border

Class SheetBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.gui.border.SheetBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.border.Border
    public class SheetBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.border.Border
    Border implementation which uses a GUIImageSheet for rendering the border. The images in the image sheet must be such that for the coordinates represent the following parts of the border:
    0, 0 1, 0 2, 0
    0, 1 2, 1
    0, 2 1, 2 2, 2

    Description per coordinate:
    x y Description
    0 0 Upper left corner
    1 0 Upper side
    2 0 Upper right corner
    0 1 Left side
    1 1 Unused
    1 2 Right side
    2 0 Lower left corner
    2 1 Lower side
    2 2 Lower right corner

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new border with the given insets and image sheets.

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType​(int scaleType)
        Sets the scaling type. Must be one of:
        • Image.SCALE_DEFAULT
        • Image.SCALE_FAST
        • Image.SCALE_SMOOTH
        • Image.SCALE_REPLICATE
        • Image.SCALE_AREA_AVERAGING
        Parameters:
        scaleType - The type used for scaling.

      • getScaleType

        public int getScaleType()
        Returns the scaling type. Must be one of:
        • Image.SCALE_DEFAULT
        • Image.SCALE_FAST
        • Image.SCALE_SMOOTH
        • Image.SCALE_REPLICATE
        • Image.SCALE_AREA_AVERAGING
        Returns:
        The scaling type of this border.
